desc: EXCLUSIVE merch brought to you by the Blind Bandit herself! Join Toph Beifong and her journey mastering earth and metalbending. Coming to you live with merchandise and events!

layout.text: Your source for all things Earthbender related, brought to you by the Blind Bandit herself! Here you will find everything the average (or maybe above average) Earth Kingdom citizen needs, including where to find the Melon Lord this summer!
